channel.description: we need to make a tut and with the tools how to do it like how to use the deob and if we get problems.im not a leech thats what this site needs so less questions and more leaning.

item.title: We need a tut for ayrans updating
item.dc:creator: @Spiraster Spiraster
item.description:
@Spiraster wrote:

I dont know enough about regex to give a detailed description, but I was able to update the definitions just by looking at how things were renamed in past aryans, and changing it to work for 367.

Read full topic
item.source: We need a tut for ayrans updating

item.title: We need a tut for ayrans updating
item.dc:creator: @d3ltr33 d3ltr33
item.description:
@d3ltr33 wrote:

Step 1. Download and execute Mopar’s automatic deob maker. -> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,443.0.html

Step 2. Read this guide and do what it says. -> http://radeon.byethost8.com/tuts/UpdatingAryan.rtf

Unfortunately there’s more to it. Myself and others get errors in renaming. Particularly unknownInt2 and unknownInt4. Apparently you need to update the definitions. could somebody please post a less vague description of what needs to be done next?

Read full topic
item.source: We need a tut for ayrans updating
